column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Not sure if I can just pleasantly surprised
column3: or it was that amazing but I really enjoyed the ramen here. Houston is not the first place that comes to mind when I think ramen but it was delicious. I forget which bowl I ordered but I also got extra seaweed on the side and did not regret it. The broth was very flavorful without being overly salty though I knew to still drink plenty of water later that night. Everything tasted fresh and the noodles were good too. If you're in Houston and looking for something hot and delicious
